segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy climbing on a two-step stool, reaching high into a cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see the "COOKIE JAR" inside; it's full of delicious treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, very resourceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, looking up at him with such anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, palm open, patiently waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely cooperating in this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of my own childhood escapades, sneaking snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being incredibly sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a bold move, considering she's just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, it would be a shame to spoil their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic sibling conspiracy right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
